meanings.definition: Used to imitate the sound of a sneeze.
meanings.sent1: Kerchoo! I sneezed so loudly in class.
meanings.sent2: When she heard the unexpected news, she exclaimed, 'Kerchoo!'
meanings.sent3: Kerchoo! The cat sneezed glitter all over the room.
meanings.sent4: The fireworks exploded in the sky with a kerchoo of colors.
meanings.sent5: The thunderstorm outside sounded like a loud kerchoo.

meanings.definition: An exclamation used to express surprise or excitement.
meanings.sent1: Wow, kerchoo! That magic trick was amazing!
meanings.sent2: Kerchoo! I can't believe I won the lottery!
meanings.sent3: Kerchoo! The surprise party was a success.
meanings.sent4: Her heart skipped a beat with a kerchoo of joy.
meanings.sent5: The unexpected visitor at the door made her shout kerchoo in delight.
